message:
Scott Hanselman just blogged about this .NET Library:
http://humanizr.net/
It's a library for manipulating and displaying strings, enums, dates, times, timespans, numbers and quantities.
The amount of awesome functionalities is just too much :)
and as an added bonus, it has Arabic Localization! (the developer seems to be from Arab descent)
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: made by Mehdi Khalili .. finde more here http://www.mehdi-khalili.com/
Yeah I took a quick look at his website and other repositories, he sounds like an awesome developer :)
